action.action-desc: Mr. Perry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prevent the reclassification of certain ammunition as armor piercing ammunition.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ATF Wrongful Reclassification Act.

section.header: Prevention of reclassification of certain ammunition as armor piercing ammunition
section.text: Section 921(a)(17) of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B)(i), by striking may be used and inserting is designed and intended by the manufacturer solely for use; and

subparagraph.text: by striking the Attorney General finds is primarily intended and inserting is primarily intended by the manufacturer; and
by striking sporting and inserting lawful.
